hero.title: Corinna Spitzer
hero.subtitle: Dog Expert
hero.description: Welcome to my world of canine expertise! As a passionate dog physiotherapist, experienced Border Whippet breeder, and dedicated flyball trainer, I'm excited to share our journey with you. Currently, we have adorable puppies growing up, being carefully trained to become the next generation of flyball champions. Whether you're interested in dog health, breeding, or sports - you've come to the right place!
hero.imageAlt: Our beautiful Border Whippet mother in a serene setting

about.title: Expert Care & Championship Experience
about.description: Meet Corinna Spitzer, a renowned Dog Physiotherapist in Munich and accomplished Flyball competitor. Her unique combination of physiotherapy expertise and competitive sports experience makes her the trusted choice for both rehabilitation and performance enhancement.

professionalCare.title: Professional Care
professionalCare.description: Specialized physiotherapy services for dogs of all breeds, from rehabilitation to sports performance.

sportsExcellence.title: Sports Excellence
sportsExcellence.description: Official physiotherapist for European champion Flyball teams and active international competitor.

expertise.title: Comprehensive Expertise
expertise.description: Combining Border Whippet breeding knowledge, sports medicine, and rehabilitation techniques.

flyball.title: International Flyball Excellence
flyball.description: As an active competitor in international Flyball events and the trusted physiotherapist for the European championship team, Corinna brings unique insights into canine sports medicine and performance optimization. This expertise translates into better care for all her patients, whether they're athletic competitors or beloved family pets.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Whether you're interested in following our Border Whippet family's journey or seeking professional physiotherapy services for your canine companion, we'd love to hear from you.

about.title: About Corinna Spitzer
about.description: Professional Dog Physiotherapist and International Flyball competitor based in Munich. Specializing in canine sports medicine, rehabilitation, and Border Whippet breeding.

footer.closing: Dedicated to excellence in canine health and sports

physiotherapy.title: Dog Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.subtitle: Professional care for your canine companion
physiotherapy.description: Corinna Spitzer is a certified dog physiotherapist based in Munich, specializing in rehabilitation, sports medicine, and performance enhancement for dogs of all breeds and sizes.

rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation
rehabilitation.description: Specialized therapy for post-surgery recovery, injury rehabilitation, and chronic condition management.

sportsMedicine.title: Sports Medicine
sportsMedicine.description: Performance optimization and injury prevention for athletic and working dogs.

geriatricCare.title: Geriatric Care
geriatricCare.description: Supportive therapy for senior dogs to maintain mobility and quality of life.

consultations.title: Consultations
consultations.description: Professional advice on home exercises, mobility aids, and adaptations for dogs with special needs.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: Each treatment plan is individually tailored to your dog's specific needs, considering their breed, age, condition, and lifestyle. I combine traditional hands-on techniques with modern therapeutic equipment to achieve the best results for your canine companion.

contact.title: Book an Appointment
contact.description: Contact me to schedule a consultation or treatment session for your dog.

breeding.title: Border Whippet Breeding
breeding.subtitle: Elegant & Graceful Companions
breeding.description: Our breeding program focuses on producing healthy, well-tempered Border Whippet puppies that combine the intelligence of Border Collies with the grace and speed of Whippets.

about.title: About Border Whippets
about.description: Border Whippets are an energetic crossbreed that inherit the intelligence and trainability of Border Collies alongside the swift, elegant movement of Whippets. These dogs excel in various dog sports while also making wonderful family companions.

puppies.title: Our Puppies
puppies.description: Follow the journey of our Border Whippet puppies through our gallery and diary entries. While all puppies from our current litter have found their forever homes, you can stay updated on future litters.

parents.title: Meet the Parents
parents.description: Our carefully selected parent dogs bring the best qualities of both breeds, ensuring healthy, athletic puppies with excellent temperaments.

contact.title: Interested in a Border Whippet?
contact.description: Contact us to learn more about our breeding program or to inquire about future litters.

flyball.title: Flyball
flyball.subtitle: Speed, Precision, Teamwork
flyball.description: Corinna Spitzer is an active competitor in the German Flyball scene as part of Team Flyball-Junkies, with national and international successes including the German record of 15.93 seconds and the Vice-European Championship title in 2019 in Division 1.

achievements.title: Achievements
items: German record of 15.93 seconds with Team Flyball-Junkies
Regular participant in national and international competitions

yoda.title: Meet Yoda
yoda.description: Yoda is considered one of the fastest Flyball dogs in Germany, with a running time of 3.48 seconds over the 15.55-meter course.

involvement.title: Organizational Involvement
involvement.description: Corinna is a licensed Flyball judge and contact person for Flyball at the German Association of Utility Dog Sports Clubs (DVG). She is also a member of the Flyball Committee of the German Kennel Club (VDH).

training.title: Training & Teamwork
training.description: Together with Sebastian Dirksen (also Yoda's owner), Corinna regularly travels from Munich to Upper Franconia to train with Team Flyball Oberfranken.

forEveryDog.title: Flyball for Every Dog
forEveryDog.description: Corinna emphasizes that Flyball is suitable for any healthy, motivated dog, regardless of breed or size. It's a fantastic sport that builds the bond between dog and handler while providing excellent physical and mental exercise.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.platform: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS)
disputeResolution.participation: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

content.title: Liability for Content
content.text1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 paragraph 1 TMG under general law. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
content.text2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which a concrete legal violation becomes known. Upon becoming aware of corresponding legal violations, we will remove this content immediately.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.text1: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, on whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking.
links.text2: However, a permanent control of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of law. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
copyright.text2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
